name: Rotate space cube
description:
Game Introduction

"Rotate space cube" is a 3D parkour game with unique gameplay. Players need to control a cube to avoid obstacles in 3D space and collect blocks to get points!

Featured Content

  • The game has a unique gameplay mechanism, which can control the ball to run on 4 planes!
  • Simple and yet difficult operation, you need to keep observing the obstacles coming at all times, and plan the avoidance route in advance!
  • The obstacles are not all stationary, there are some moving obstacles.
  • The fresh picture style and moving music bring you a relaxing experience!
